Pharmakos berries are used in making goblin potions, which are used during the Land of the Goblins quest and Hopespear's Will miniquest. They can picked from pharmakos bushes near the Makeover Mage.

Products[edit | edit source]

ItemMembersSkillsXPMaterials
Goblin potion(3)
  • 47
  • 55
  • 1 × Toadflax potion (unf)
  • 1 × Pharmakos berries

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In Greek, "Pharmakos" means "medicine", although in other contexts it can sometimes also mean "poison", ironically.
  • In RuneScape, Pharmakos berries are given directly to the player by the Makeover Mage rather than being harvested from nearby bushes.

[[File:Pharmakos berries detail.png|100px|left]]
'''Pharmakos berries''' are used in making [[goblin potion]]s, which are used during the [[Land of the Goblins]] [[quest]] and [[Hopespear's Will]] [[miniquest]]. They can picked from [[pharmakos bush]]es near the [[Makeover Mage]].

==Products==
{{Uses material list|Pharmakos berries}}

==Trivia==
* In Greek, "Pharmakos" means "medicine", although in other contexts it can sometimes also mean "poison", ironically.
* In ''RuneScape'', Pharmakos berries are given directly to the player by the Makeover Mage rather than being harvested from nearby bushes.
